Sample YAML Metadata Utilities

Sample YAML Metadata Utilities

sampleYAML(yaml, keys, ...)

# S4 method for list,character
sampleYAML(yaml, keys)

Arguments

yaml

Project summary YAML list.
keys

Nested operator keys, supplied as a character vector.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

tibble.

Note

Metrics are only generated for a standard RNA-seq run with aligned counts. Fast RNA-seq mode with lightweight counts (pseudocounts) doesn't output the same metrics into the YAML.

See also

Other YAML Utilities: sampleYAMLMetadata, sampleYAMLMetrics

Examples

url <- paste(
    "http://bcbiobase.seq.cloud",
    "bcbio",
    "project-summary.yaml",
    sep = "/")
yaml <- basejump::readYAML(url)
#> Reading project-summary.yaml
sampleYAML(yaml, "metadata") %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 2
#> $ description <chr> "group1_1", "group1_2", "group2_1", "group2_2"
#> $ group       <chr> "ctrl", "ctrl", "ko", "ko"
